Looking for that amazing $3/month hosting deal?

Sorry... It's not avaliable anymore.

The reason for the change is so that I can focus on my Web Development business. If you're looking into getting a website, I can help you with every step of the way, including finding adequate hosting.

Existing customers have nothing to worry about, I am not canceling any old contracts.

I reccomend dreamhost

I currently use dreamhost for my websites and I reccomend them for most of my clients. They have solid, feature-packed servers and competitive prices.
